name: Interact with the Door to the Wine Cellar

nodes.text: Good hunting!
Before the Young Master enters into danger, Gregor wishes to make sure that Master Shawn is prepared for danger. I do hope that you have some sort of weapon with which to defend yourself?
I'm fully prepared for any danger.
Please be careful, Young Master - there are many dangers in there.
Oh, and if you see a door marked, "Very Dangerous," please do not open that door. Just stay where it is only a little bit dangerous.
Why? What's behind that door?
Gregor is uncertain how to answer Master Shawn. Gregor only knows that something very large and very scary moves behind the door.
Don't worry, I know how to take care of myself.
Very good, Master Shawn, that is indeed a fine weapon. However, you'll have to equip it before I can let you go into danger.
Equip the dagger? Oh, right. I should do that.
I don't have a weapon yet.
Please, Master Shawn - do not go into danger unprepared. The Wine Cellar is not safe for you.
How can I get a weapon if I have no money?
Did you not get a set of weapons when you enrolled in this school? Perhaps you should look in your room to see if you can find something useful.
How dangerous can the Wine Cellar be if it's only a few bugs and bad rats?
No, no, no, Master Shawn - Gregor begs you not to take such dangers lightly. The Headmaster will not be pleased with Gregor if the Young Master dies in the Wine Cellar!
The door is locked.
I am sorry, young Master, but the door to Wine Cellar is always locked during the day - school rules. After suppertime, though, it will be unlocked.
Come back during the evening times and Gregor will let you through.
I am so very sorry, Master Shawn, but it is much too late for you to go into the Wine Cellar to hunt for tasty Drats tonight. Perhaps another time...
The wine cellar is through that door. Not the most pleasant of places, Master, despite the presence of wine and many delectable Drats!
That's the way to the wine cellar.
I'm not sure what's through this door. There's no sign.
I think I hear some scurrying sounds running away from the door...
Ah! The Drats are lively in the wine cellar. How good it would be if someone went in there to catch them all.
I don't hear anything near the door right now, so it's probably safe to enter right now.
I can't hear anything through this door. Maybe I need my ears cleaned...
I think I can hear some Drats running around in the room.
Who knows what Evils lurk in the heart of the cellar?
The Ratty knows!
